00008 #if !defined(Apc_TaggedProblemCode_hpp)
00009 #define Apc_TaggedProblemCode_hpp
00010 
00011 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00012 #include <Auxiliary/BitField.hpp>
00013 
00014 
00015 /*  ========================================================================
00016     Supplementary Service Problem Tag [GSM 04.80, 3.6.7, Table 3.13]
00017     (msap_msg_mn.pr: 1375)
00018     ========================================================================*/
00020 class TaggedProblemCode {
00021     public:
00023         enum ProblemTag {
00025             General = 0x00,         // tag = 0x80
00027             Invoke = 0x01,          // tag = 0x81
00029             ReturnResult = 0x02,    // tag = 0x82
00031             ReturnError = 0x03,     // tag = 0x83
00033             InvalidTag = 0x0f
00034         };
00035 
00036         enum ProblemCode {
00037 
00039             UnrecognizedComponent       = 0x00, // tag = 0x80, code = 0x00 
00041             MistypedComponent           = 0x01, // tag = 0x80, code = 0x01
00043             BadlyStructuredComponent    = 0x02, // tag = 0x80, code = 0x02;
00044 
00046             DuplicateInvokeId           = 0x10, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x00
00048             UnrecognizedOperation       = 0x11, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x01
00050             MistypedProParameter        = 0x12, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x02
00052             ResourceLimitation          = 0x13, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x03;
00054             InitiatingRelease           = 0x14, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x04;
00056             UnrecognizedLinkedId        = 0x15, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x05;
00058             LinkedResponseUnexpected    = 0x16, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x06;
00060             UnexpectedLinkedOperation   = 0x17, // tag = 0x81, code = 0x07;
00061 
00063             UnrecognizedInvokeId        = 0x20, // tag = 0x82, code = 0x00;
00065             ReturnResultUnexpected      = 0x21, // tag = 0x82, code = 0x01;
00067             MistypedResParameter        = 0x22, // tag = 0x82, code = 0x02;
00068 
00070             UnrecognizedErrorInvokeId   = 0x30, // tag = 0x83, code = 0x00;
00072             ReturnErrorUnexpected       = 0x31, // tag = 0x83, code = 0x01;
00074             UnrecognizedError           = 0x32, // tag = 0x83, code = 0x02;
00076             UnexpectedError             = 0x33, // tag = 0x83, code = 0x03;
00078             MistypedErrorParameter      = 0x34, // tag = 0x83, code = 0x04;
00079 
00081             InvalidCode                 = 0x0f
00082         };
00083 
00085         explicit TaggedProblemCode(UINT8 incoming_tag = InvalidTag, UINT8 incoming_code = InvalidCode)
00086             // msb of incoming tag is shifted away (identification done by lsb of incoming tag)
00087             : m_tagged_problem_code((incoming_tag << 4) | incoming_code) {};
00088 
00090         TaggedProblemCode(const TaggedProblemCode & code) 
00091             : m_tagged_problem_code(code.GetProblemCode()) {}
00092 
00094         TaggedProblemCode(const ProblemCode code)
00095             : m_tagged_problem_code((UINT8)code) {}
00096 
00098         UINT8 GetTagAsByte() const { return (m_tagged_problem_code >> 4) | 0x80; }
00100         UINT8 GetCodeAsByte() const { return m_tagged_problem_code & 0x0f; }
00101 
00102 
00104         ProblemTag GetProblemTag() const { return (ProblemTag)(m_tagged_problem_code >> 4); } // 0xff->0x0f InvalidTag;
00105 
00106 
00108         ProblemCode GetProblemCode() const { return (ProblemCode)m_tagged_problem_code; }
00109         void SetProblemCode(ProblemCode code) { m_tagged_problem_code = code; } // tag is set implicitly
00110 
00111     private:
00112         UINT8 m_tagged_problem_code;
00113 };
00114 
00115 
00116 #endif  // Apc_TaggedProblemCode_hpp
00117
